subject: Re: Hello Dear.
body:
Hello Robert,

We acknowledge the receipt of your response and all that you said are noted, since you have made it known to us that, you did not send any one to claim your  compensation fund, we would like to bring you to to speed on the procedure on how to claim your compensation fund.

Please note that, there are confirmation that must be made before the funds will be release to you, hence we must compare your information with what is in our data to ascertain the payment codes in your name as have already been inputted in our system, once we are through with the review, we shall outline to you the secure process of releasing the funds to you without any glitches, on that note you are required to provide us with the below information's.

1. Full Name:......................................
2. Nationality:.............................
3. Contact Address:..................................
4. Telephone Number:.................................
5. Occupation...................................
6. Age...............................................
7. Position at work ...................................


Upon the receipt of the above listed details from you, I shall proceed with the process, Please if there is any part of the message that you did not understand very well, do not hesitate to ask questions, I shall be looking forward to your response.
Regards
Mrs Amina Mohamed.

subject: Re: Hello Dear.
body:
Hello Mrs. Ina Mohamed,

Thank you for your response and for explaining the procedure to claim my fund. I appreciate your willingness to assist me in this matter. Before I provide you with the requested information, could you please clarify what exactly the payment codes are and how they are related to releasing the funds? I just want to make sure I understand everything correctly.

Also, could you please explain why my position at work is required? Is it necessary for the process of releasing the funds? I'm curious about how that information is relevant.

Thank you again for your help. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: Re: Hello Dear.
body:
Attention Robert,

Please do follow up with the procedures to avoid any further mistake. To avoid all further bottlenecks, we have to allocated to you new international payment Voucher Number. Approval Number: 7402-2023. Merit Number; 781 and release code Number; 097400.

Yes all requested information are necessary so that we will not have any hitch along the line. Please kindly fill this for our new allocated Voucher,

1. Full Name:......................................
2. Nationality:.............................
3. Contact Address:..................................
4. Telephone Number:.................................
5. Occupation...................................
6. Age...............................................
7. Position at work ...................................

View my working ID for identification, Send yours as well.

Mrs Amina Mohammed.




Thanks.
Mrs Amina Mohammed.

subject: Re: Hello Dear.
body:
Hello Mrs. Ina Mohammed,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your attention to detail and ensuring that there are no mistakes in the procedures. However, I have a few questions before proceeding with filling out the new allocated voucher.

1. Could you please provide more information about the purpose of this payment voucher? What is it for?
2. Is there a specific deadline by which I need to fill out the voucher and provide the requested information?
3. Can you explain what the approval number, merit number, and release code number are used for?

I apologize if these questions seem basic, but I want to make sure I understand everything clearly before proceeding. Thank you for your understanding.

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: This is the meaasge,  i think you will simply understand it better
body:
Hello Dear.

This is from the office of the United nation Organization. Did you send someone else to make a claim for your compensation fund? Respond now so that we don,t make any mistakes.

This payment Program is organized for charity organizations, unpaid government Contractors, Scam victims and for those who lost their properties/businesses during the Covid19 crisis.
Kindly respond to this message in order to direct and process your payment within 7 working days without any further delay.

I look forward to receiving your urgent response.
Regards
Mrs Amina Mohamed.

subject: Re: This is the meaasge,  i think you will simply understand it better
body:
Hello Mrs. Ina Mohamed,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided about the payment program for charity and unpaid government scam victims. It's unfortunate that there are people who have suffered during such crises.

Could you please provide more details about how this program works? I would like to understand the process and any requirements involved before proceeding further.

Also, could you clarify what fund you are referring to? I want to make sure we are on the same page regarding the purpose of this communication.

Thank you again for your message, and I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Robert
